song.englishname: The One Thing I Have Left

english.segment1: Will someone please radio for help?. Cuz I think I'm allergic to myself. And they think they can throw us all away. We gotta stop it before it's all too late
english.segment2: There's got to be a better way. They dissect everything we say. To try to make us feel this way
english.segment3: And you can take the one thing I have left. I'd give it all away for so much less. Can even take the heart inside my chest. Woah-woah. And you can take the one thing I have left. Beat me to the ground and take my breath. But you can't take who I am. woah-woah.
english.segment4: And I swear we were born to let you down. We scream but never make a sound. We point but don't know which direction. We are America right now
english.segment5: There's got to be a better way. They dissect everything we say. To try to make us feel this way
english.segment6: And you can take the one thing I have left. I'd give it all away for so much less. Can even take the heart inside my chest. Woah-woah. And you can take the one thing I have left. Beat me to the ground and take my breath. But you can't take who I am. woah-woah.
english.segment7: How can I be the same?. How can I say the blame?. How come I am so tired of all these charades?. How can I be the one?. How can I hold the gun?. How can I see if everyone else is to blame?
english.segment8: hey! hey!. Don't want to be the. hey! hey!. Don't want to see the. hey! hey!
english.segment9: Cuz we point the finger. Think everyone else is to blame
